text: Iske saath unke Nabi ne unko yeh bhi bataya ke â€œkhuda ki taraf se uske baadshah muqarrar honay ki alamat yeh hai ke uske ahad mein woh sandook tumhein wapas mil jayega, jismein tumhare Rubb ki taraf se tumhare liye sukoon e qalb ka samaan hai, jismein aale Moosa aur aale Haroon ke chodey huey tabarrukaat hain, aur jisko is waqt Farishte sambhale huey hain agar tum momin ho, to yeh tumhare liye bahut badi nishani hai
